headline: Putin Outlines Political Overhaul, Including a Possible Post for Himself
abstract: By proposing to empower a toothless advisory body, President Vladimir V. Putin set off new speculation about his long-term plans.
lead_paragraph: MOSCOW — President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia submitted constitutional amendments on Monday that empower a previously toothless advisory council as a powerful policy arbiter, setting up what could be a future role for himself as Russia’s long-term paramount leader.
